titles.title: To authorize appropriations for certain provisions of the Workforce Investment Act of 1998.
To authorize appropriations for certain provisions of the Workforce Investment Act of 1998.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary: Amends the Workforce Investment Act of 1998 to authorize appropriations for FY2010-FY2017 for activities under the youth employment, adult employment and training, and dislocated worker employment and training programs.
